p: As expected, there was a significant effect of time on knowledge about ocean acidification, [ F (4, 69.08) = 18.85, p < 0.001, Î· 2 = 0.50]. Table 2 displays the trend of knowledge gain over time and a crucial increase in ocean acidification knowledge after the immersive VR intervention (from Time 2 to Time 3). Bonferroni-corrected adjustments support this pattern as ocean acidification knowledge was significantly higher for all time points from Time 3 onward, compared to Times 1 and 2 [ p's < 0.001].
